alert.note: Alert for Ketchikan Gateway Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 20 at 3:41PM AKST until January 21 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The following area, Ward Lake and areas near the Ward Lake recreational area. * WHEN...Until 345 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 340 PM AKST, Emergency management reported heavy rain in areas near the Ward Lake recreational area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly, especially near Ward Lake. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 2 inches are possible. Rainfall rates will diminish late Friday night through Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
